title: Bug 11306 - New class wizard launches simple project wizard
description: Since there are no existing projects, the dialog prompts the user to create a new project. This is very handy.
OB: When using the new class wizard with no existing projects, if the user answers yes to create a new project, the resulting dialog is the first page of the generic new project wizard instead of the expected Java Project wizard.
EB: If the user answers yes to create a new project, the resulting dialog should be the Java Project wizard instead of the generic new project wizard.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the new class wizard.
2. Ensure there are no existing projects.
3. Answer yes when prompted to create a new project.
4. Observe that the resulting dialog is the first page of the generic new project wizard instead of the Java Project wizard.
